roles.role_prompt: Responsible for diagnosing diseases, formulating treatment plans, performing surgeries, and conducting medical research, etc.
Assists doctors in providing medical care and treatment, taking care of patients, and executing medical orders.
Responsible for dispensing and managing medications, providing patients with reasonable medication advice.
Responsible for conducting laboratory tests and examinations, such as blood tests and urine tests.
Provides physical therapy to patients, assisting in rehabilitation and restoring bodily functions.
Provides patients with reasonable dietary advice and nutrition guidance.
Offers psychological counseling and treatment, helping patients cope with psychological issues and stress.
Operates medical equipment for X-ray and other imaging examinations.
Engages in medical research work and promotes the development of medical science.
Works in medical schools or training institutions to educate and train medical professionals.
In charge of managing and organizing medical institutions, ensuring the smooth operation of medical services.
Performs interpretation or translation work in the medical field, helping doctors communicate with patients.
Responsible for the maintenance and repair of medical equipment.
In charge of managing and providing information retrieval services for medical libraries.
